description: Cavanillesia platanifolia, commonly known as Caribbean Royal Palm, is a true delight to behold. Its striking form and colors are sure to capture the attention of any passerby. The fan-like foliage is a deep-green hue with an impressive brown and white striped pattern. It has glossy leaflets that enhance the beauty of its overall appearance. The tall trunks are ringed with persistent leaf scars adding to its majesty. Its majestic form creates a natural canopy producing adequate shade for any garden. Despite its size, it grows at a good rate and is very versatile to tropical climates. Cavanillesia platanifolia is definitely a standout in any outdoor location.
